name: IntrinsicWidth
desc: A widget that sizes its child to the child's maximum intrinsic width.

fields.name: stepWidth
fields.desc: If non-null, force the child's width to be a multiple of this value.

fields.name: stepHeight
fields.desc: If non-null, force the child's height to be a multiple of this value.

nodes.name: Basic Usage of IntrinsicWidth
desc: As shown in the example: the width above can be changed, the width in the middle is fixed, and the width below takes the highest value of the former two.
